title: Brookfield to buy controlling stake in Leap Green for $550 million
description: Brookfield has made a significant equity investment of over $200 million in Leap Green Energy, a renewables platform based in Tamil Nadu that focuses on providing clean energy solutions to commercial and industrial customers. This investment includes an option for an additional $350 million to support future growth, aiming to exceed 3 GW capacity in the next four to five years.
